narrative: Added a small CLI demo example to show how the new scan-and-validate workflow can be triggered programmatically. Updated README to document this usage, expanding developer guidance.
user_input: Keep advancing your work and think of building examples usage to guide in what we will do with that
scene: Before, contributors had no short example of using the CLI from Python. Now a demo script and README instructions illustrate basic invocation, helping newcomers understand workflow integration.
